alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 8:35AM CST until January 11 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony affecting Wabash, Posey, White, Gibson and Gallatin Counties. .The Wabash River will crest toward the end of this week, then fall slowly below flood stage next week. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
